reference.title: Error Code References
reference.shortdesc: This reference lists common error codes encountered during the setup and operation of IoT devices. Each entry includes the error code, system-generated message, a brief description, and a suggested resolution or cross-reference to the appropriate troubleshooting topic.

section.title: Error Code Table:
section.p: The following table outlines key error codes reported by the system. These codes help users identify and resolve issues such as connectivity failures, authentication problems, or firmware update interruptions. Where applicable, troubleshooting references are provided for further assistance.

row.entry: Incorrect credentials entered or authentication timeout.
Device failed to communicate with server.
Device unable to sync settings with the cloud.
Restart device and ensure internet is stable.
Hub failed to detect the IoT device.
Re-scan or reset the device before retrying.
Connected device uses an unsupported communication protocol.
Refer to supported_devices_matrix.dita for valid options.
Companion app version is not compatible with the device.
Update app from official store and retry.
